inn1.comm: overpitched and outside off, driven straight to point again
back of a length and just outside off, punchily blocked to mid-off
peach from Junaid as Sarkar is beaten soundly. Angled in on a fullish length and then swings away, past the lackadaisical push of Sarkar
fractionally back of a length and outside off, guided past backward point, towards third man
fuller and on off, he presses forward and defends it back to the bowler
angled in on off on a shortish length, Sarkar manages an inside edge that dribbles fine on the leg side after passing the stumps
on a good length and straightens outside off, Sarkar does not move his feet, pokes and watches the ball zip past the outside edge
dug in on a back of a length and angles away outside off, steered away to deep third man
pitched up and straighter in line, Tamim lunges forward and presses it to short cover
shortish and outside off, Tamim gets on top of the bounce and crisply punches it between the covers and point, sends it whistling away to the boundary
pitched further up and curves in with the angle, squeezed drive to mid-on off the inner part of the bat for a hustled single
good length ball on off, punched back at the bowler, who has a shy at the stumps and misses. Follows it up with a stare
on the fuller side now, driven to mid-off
pitched up and comes into the left-hander on middle, who pushes it to the left of mid-on
dug in on a back of a length and outside off, he camps on the back foot and forces it to point, straight to the fielder
classy stroke from Tamim. Back of a length and width on offer as well, Tamim stands up tall and balanced as he picks the gap and punches it to the cover-point boundary
he persists with a shortish length, the line is on off, punched back at the bowler
back of a length and angled in on off, poked down to deep third man, more off a controlled outside edge
dug in on a back of a length jags back in to climb over the off stump, Tamim reads it well and shoulders arms to that
banged in short and outside off, Tamim leaps, gets on top of the bounce and cracks a cut up and over backward point. He is loving these short balls
very fullish and on the pads, he manages an inside edge onto the pad, the ball sneaks away behind square leg
good length ball on middle, blocked stoutly to the covers
back of a length and skiddy on middle, dabbed towards short third man with an angled bat

back of a length and angled on off, he aims for a cut, but does not have enough room to play with. The angled bat gives away to an inside edge to the leg side. The extra lift on that foiled Sarkar's shot
good length ball on middle and off, blocked to the covers
back of a length and hurries on off, punched to the man at shortish point
dug in on a back of a length and angled in on off, he is crease-bound as he pushes and gets an inside edge that wanders away to mid-on
veering onto the pads, flicked to the leg side
Junaid bangs in a bouncer - flies through to the keeper - as the batsman sinks under it. The umpire at square leg signalled it a wide for height
back of a length and on middle and leg, the bat twists in Sarkar's hand as he works it, rather unconvincingly to midwicket
an appeal for lbw, turned down. Angled in on middle on a back of a length, Tamim aims to flick it across the line, is beaten as he is struck on the knee roll. That was bouncing over the stumps
Tamim nips down the track, nearly yorks himself and jabs it to mid-on off the inner part of the bat
picked away off the pads to long leg
back of a length and skiddy on middle and off, he hangs back as he punches it to the covers, straight to the fielder
Rahat errs on the short side, the line is just a shade outside off, he takes it from there and pulls it over mid-on. Hit high on the bat, not middled, but put away to the boundary
Rahat overcorrects, this is full on the pads, Sarkar flips his wrists and flicks it over midwicket for successive fours
fuller and outside off, driven towards the covers
Tamim charges down the track, Junaid pulls his length back outside off. Mis-hit drive to mid-off, straight to the fielder
very full and straight, clipped away behind square leg with ease. Long leg runs to his left and keeps it to a couple
very full and angled in on middle, pushed back at Junaid, who stretches his left hand and intercepts the ball
Dragged short and outside off, Tamim pivots on the back foot and unleashes a strong-looking pull over midwicket. He has attacked the short balls today
fullish and outside off, he angles his bat now and glides it to point
starts off with a gentle loosener - short and wide outside off - mistimed cut to point
crunchylicious. Back of a length and outside off, he stands tall and punches it to the right of backward point, sped away to the boundary
angled in on off, he shuffles across and misses the glance. Wears it on the thigh but it wasn't threating the stumps
pacy short ball from Wahab, hurries onto Sarkar, who takes his eyes off the ball. But somehow manages to fend it away to the leg side
shortish and angling away outside off, sits up to be smashed. But Sarkar can only chop it to point
back of a length and just outside off, weak punch to the covers
fullish in length and outside off, driven to mid-off, finds the fielder
back of a length and outside off, this was a slippery slower ball. Tamim is early onto the pull and only connects with air
pitched up and angles in on middle, punched out to mid-on
banged in short and climbs at ribcage-height, he swivels on the back foot and pulls it away behind square on the leg side
shortish and outside off, he hops up and chips it over point
pitched up and nibbles in to Tamim, who gets an inside edge, which rolls to mid-on
Sarkar stands on the leg stump, Riaz bangs it shortish, blocked to the off side
shortish on the hips, mistimed pull to midwicket
67.8mph slower ball slips past the leg stump, Sarkar is early into his almighty swing and misses

banged in short, he goes for the pull. Does not middle it, the ball dies in front of an onrushing Junaid from deep backward square. He gets his body behind the ball and prevents it from reaching the boundary
back of a length and skiddy on off, dabbed to point
84.4mph short ball directed outside off, Tamim sways away from the line of it and leaves it
pushed through quicker, he takes it on the pad, the ball rolls to the leg side
a bit round-armish and on middle, pushed down the track for a single

floated on the middle stump, Tamim can't nudge it to the leg side, takes it on the pad. It would have just clipped, leg stump, not given. Ajmal chats with Sarfraz for a review and decides against it. Umpire call would have prevailed anyway
paddled down to short fine
tossed up and fullish, blocked to the covers
straight roller on middle, defensively pushed to the off side
back of a length and on middle, tapped in front of point
slash and a miss to a back of a length delivery outside off
good length ball around off, he comes forward and pats it to point
angled in on middle and leg, tucked to midwicket
good length, straight in line, defended back to the bowler
Tamim waits on this back-of-a-length delivery outside off and steers it deftly to deep third man
slid through outside off, dabbed in front of point
pushed down leg, mis-hit paddle to short fine
much slower through the air, he manages an inside edge to mid-on
darted short and quick, whipped to midwicket
looped up on middle, he hangs back and defends it
on a length and slid through quick outside off, dabbed to point
back of a length and outside off, Tamim nips down the track, slashes and gets beaten

Sarkar is in trouble, he has to depart. 85.3mph back of a length and hurries on middle and off, Tamim manages an inside edge onto the pad, which rolls onto the pitch, adjacent to the off side. The pair want to sneak in a quick single. Wahab runs towards the ball, collects it, under-arm flicks it back onto the stumps and even plucks out the leg stump. Sarkar's bat was on the line by the time the bails came off the groove. He is OUT and the TV umpire confirms it as well
back of a length and hurries on off, blocked in front of the covers
full and slanted miles wide outside off, left alone. Well past the tram-line and wide called
bouncer angles across Mahmudullah, who bails out of the attempted pull and sways away
pitched up and outside off, sweetly-timed drive between point and the covers. The man at sweeper runs across and limits it to a single
very full and on the pads, flicked away backward of square leg
fuller on middle, driven down to long-off with the full face of the bat
quicker and on off, worked to midwicket
Ajmal gives this some air on off, not much turn, pushed down to long-on
dug in shortish, round-armed on middle, Tamim hangs on the back foot and punches it to mid-on
drifting onto the pads of Tamim is Ajmal, he does not meet with the paddle sweep, off the pad to short fine
tossed up on the leg stump, Tamim does not get hold of the paddle, gets an inside edge that wanders to short fine
good length and angling away outside off, Mahmudullah does not want any of it
shortish and skiddy on off, Mahmudullah nearly chops it back onto the stumps. Manages an inside edge that just about sneaks past the off stump
back of a length and outside off, Mahmudullah clunks a cut and finds Fawad at backward point
length delivery on off, Mahmudullah shuffles across and nurdles a single behind square on the leg side for one
bumper at 83.0 mph, flies through to the keeper as Tamim sways his head out of the way
pitched up and outside off, Tamim reaches out and taps it in front of point
length ball outside off, pushed towards deep point for one
straight roller on middle, worked to short midwicket

an appeal for lbw, not given. Ajmal chats with Azhar and opts for a referral. It was a belated referral, time out says the umpire as Pakistan miss the 15-second dealine. Flatter on the leg stump, Tamim sinks to one knee and wears it on the pad. Replays show that the ball kissed the glove before rapping Tamim on the front pad. It would have drifted down as well with the angle
he gives this more air, driven down to long-off
helped around the corner to the leg side
spins in on off, turned to the leg side
bouncer from Rahat, Tamim gets his noggin out of the way
on a length and outside off, dinked to deep third man
back of a length and on the hips, tucked away towards deep backward square
fullish and on the pads, nuggety nurdle behind square leg for one
back of a length and outside off, punched crisply to the covers
bouncer angled across Mahmudullah, good height on this. Mahmudullah jerks his head out of the way
looped up outside off, he comes forward to smother it
flatter and on middle and leg, Tamim advances and drills it to the left of Saad Nasim
drifting onto the pads, worked to the right of short fine for one
Tamim uses his feet, Nasim drags his length back. The former adjusts and pushes it back to the bowler
crackin' from Tamim. Fuller and outside off, he bends his knee and drives it past the covers, the ball hurtled away to the boundary
Tamim takes it from off and plays a whippy drive to long-on
on a good length and outside off, dabbed to short third. Tamim wants a quick single, but is sent back
short and wide outside off, Tamim takes it from there and pulls it to midwicket
back of a length and outside off as Rahant sees Tamim skip out, flat-batted to mid-off. Azhar Ali dives to his right and stops the ball, sharp work
back of a length and outside off, dabbed in front of point
Mahmudullah backs away, Rahat bangs a bouncer at 82mph, he can't connect with the attempted pull

Rahat Ali strikes! Mahmudullah steps away outside leg, seeks to crash it through the covers, but misses his stroke completely. This back-of-a-length slower ball crashes into the middle stump. It is knocked out
fullish and on middle, driven down to long-on
pitched on off and turns sharply outside off, he hangs his bat and gets an inside edge that runs fine on the leg side
tossed up, tapped to the off-side
flatter and quicker on middle and leg, whipped away to long-on for one
shortish hurries on the leg stump, Tamim mistimes the pull behind square on the leg side
half-tracker on the off stump and duly dispatched to the boundary. He rocks back and nails a pull over midwicket, beats the fielder in the deep
fullish in length and around off, he crunches it to the right of mid-off for a quick single
back of a length and hurries on of, keeps low as well. Mushfiq adjusts and defends it to point
back of a length, top-of-off line, Mushfiq gets on top of the bounce and dabs it in front of point
shortish and on the stumps, climbs disconcertingly, Mushfiq steps back and pulls it to the left of deep midwicket
back of a length and outside off, glided intentionally to the left of the keeper. It ran away off an outside edge
fine retort from Rahat, he bangs a bouncer, forcing Tamim to duck under that
flat and quick on off, whipped to deep midwicket

what a clanger! Poor cricket all round. This was a gentle full toss, chipped back at the bowler, who moves to his left, but can only parry it away. Saad Nasim did not anticipate the catch, but that should have been taken
pitched up on off, driven past a diving cover to long-off
90.7kph, nudged to short fine
worked in front of square on the leg side for one
much fuller, turned to the leg side for one
flat and darted outside off, cut away to the off-side sweeper
shortish and outside off, he camps on the back foot and punches it down to long-on to collect a fifty
Mushfiq skips out, takes it on the full and punches it to long-on
81.9kph low full toss, Tamim unfurls a reverse-sweep and sends it away to the boundary after beating short third
pushed through quicker and on off and middle, he seeks an encore. But misses the reverse sweep and is struck on the pad, not given
darted shortish, cramped for room. Worked to the leg side
nice, juicy full toss on off, Mushfiq lifts it over short cover, the ball sped away to the boundary
dropped short and wide outside off, Mushfiq gets on top of the bounce and cuts it to the right of backward point. Superb connection
fuller and on middle and leg, clipped to long-on
slid through shortish and outside off, punched between short third and backward point
quick fizzer from Nasim, Tamim jabs it to the off side
drifting down leg, Tamim can't help it away, wide called
floated outside off, driven to mid-off
arm-ball comes in with the angle on off, Mushfiq goes back and punches it to point
flatter and on middle and leg, Mushfiq sinks to one knee in a flash and slog-sweeps over midwicket
darted flat and quicker, driven to long-on
Haris shortens his length, tucked to deep midwicket
another arm-ball on off, blocked in front of point
Mushfiq fetches this one from outside off, half pulls and half flicks it to long-on
shortish and outside off, encourages the cut, hit to the left of sweeper cover
54.2mph low full toss on middle and leg, punched to long-on
fired full and on off, Mushfiq jams a drive to long-on
full toss on middle, which is reverse-swept straight to backward point
fuller and on middle and leg, clipped in front of square on the leg side
fuller and on off, Mushfiq executes another drive to long-off
back of a length and on middle and leg, punched to the right of long-on, towards cow-corner
dug in short and wide outside off, cracked away to the off-side sweeper for one
darted flat and outside off, forced down to long-on
Mushfiq fetches it from outside off and turns it to midwicket
Tamim goes bang, raises the first six of the series. Flatter and outside off, he sinks down to one knee and slogs it over deep midwicket
slid through flat and quick again, anddd that's an encore. He bends down and swipes it high and over deep midwicket. Has he shifted gears?
pushed through quicker and outside off, chopped in front of point
short and wide outside off, cut to the left of Rahat at sweeper cover

another faux pas, Junaid drops it. This was tossed up and spins outside off, Mushfiq goes for his favourite slog sweep. Top-edges it in the air, Junaid runs across from mid-on to his right, towards midwicket region and shells it. Pops in and pops out
whipped off the pads to deep midwicket
floated up, driven to the off side
pushed through outside off, bunted to the covers
low full toss on off as Junaid misses the yorker, tucked away to midwicket
back of a length and just outside off, punched to the covers
fired fuller and outside off, punched down to long-on
Tamim nips down the track, Junaid drags it short and outside off. Flat-bats it to the covers, not much power behind that
near yorker swings in on middle, whipped down to long-on
pitched up and angled in, chipped in front of midwicket
low full toss on off, tucked around the corner for a single
charming stroke. Fuller and on off, he takes a step forward and drives it inside-out overs the covers. Beats long-off to his left
shortish and outside off, cut away to sweeper cover
whipped off the hips to deep midwicket
slid through quicker and spins in with with some extra bounce, Mushfiq fends it away. Hit high on the bat as Azhar foils the cut
low full toss, clipped to wide long-on
angled in on from round the stumps, worked to the leg side
full toss on the pads, whipped away to deep midwicket. Tamim should have put that away
banged in short and climbs outside off, Mushfiq takes his eyes off the ball, but rolls his wrists on it and pulls it behind square leg
dug in shortish and outside off, he stays back and pulls it away to the left of long-on
dragged short and outside off, he takes it from there, deals with the bounce and pulls it over midwicket. The quick outfield does the rest
low full toss on middle as Junaid's yorker goes awry, pushed to mid-off for a speedy single. The fielder has a shy at the stumps and misses, the throw was off-radar and short fine has it covered
round-armed, quick on middle, defended back to Ajmal
Ajmal drifts down leg, Tamim bends down and paddles it very fine on the leg side, Hafeez runs back from short fine and chases in vain
quicker and outside off, pushed defensively to point
darted on off, Tamim is behind that in defence
looped up on middle and leg, nudged gently in front of midwicket
back of a length and outside off, punched to the right of the covers
back of a length and hurries on off at 87mph, chopped onto the ground. The ball bounces to point
Wahab strays on the hips of Mushfiq, he misses the glance, but they sneak a single via leg bye
slower short ball on middle and off, Tamim spots it, waits for it and pulls it away, beats the man at deep midwicket to bring up the 100 partnership
back of a length and comes back in to slice Tamim into half. Tamim looks to work it to the leg side and gets beaten on the inside edge
slash and a miss to a length ball outside off
back of a length and outside off, Tamim has another slash at it with his feet glued to the crease and is beaten again
quicker and outside off and Mushfiq brings up his fifty with his pet shot. Bends down, slog-sweeps it over midwicket and gives it marching orders to the cow-corner boundary
follows up the four with a nudge to midwicket
pushed through outside off, Tamim waits on it, uses the pace on it and guides it away to the right of short third. Neatly played
flatter and quicker on off, pushed in front of point
first century for Tamim since March 2013. Veering down leg, Tamim helps it behind square on the leg side, beats short fine. Mushfiq hugs Tamim, the crowd enjoying this
flat and hurled in on off, mishit slog sweep to long-on
on a length and well outside off, Tamim throws his bat at it and slices it away over backward point, beats square third man as well
shortish and outside off, Tamim swat-pulls it away to long-on
back of a length and comes in with the angle on off, Mushfiq gets an inside edge that trickles behind square leg
Wahab goes wide of the crease and sprays it on the pads of Tamim, who was backing away a touch. Off the pad and sneaks to the off side
back of a length and outside off, pushed to point via an open face
precise placement from Mushfiq and he reaps reward. Pitched up and outside off, he leans forward and unfurls a lovely drive between the covers and mid-off
what.a.shot from Tamim. Ajmal pushes this flat on middle, Tamim runs down the track, makes room and goes inside-out over the covers
darted flat and quick, tucked to deep midwicket after backing away
angled on the pads from round the stumps, worked behind square on the leg side
pushed through outside off, Tamim skips out, attacks it and slices it in the air. The man at backward point was in the picture but the ball loops over him and runs away
Tamim is down the track again, he connects well and sends it soaring over long-on
flat and darted quick at 98.9kph, Tamim advances and slices it over the covers, the ball twists in his hand
Mushfiq opens the face of the bat on impact with this good length ball outside off and guides it to deep third man
right in the blockhole at the base of the leg stump, Tamim jabs his bat down and keeps it out
high full toss, over the waistline, pulled away in front of square on the leg side
Bangladesh have cranked up the tempo. Back of a length and outside off, he advances, makes room and carts it over the covers
fuller-length delivery on off, Mushfiq gets under that and lifts it up and over mid-on, who is inside the circle. Half-volley and punished
yorker length outside off, Mushfiq can't jam it out
Mushfiq backs away and makes room, Rahat Ali slips in a slower short ball. Mushfiq is undone by the change of pace on that, can't lay bat onto it
very full and fired on middle, he backs away and drills it to mid-off
very full and on the leg stump, he backs away and skelps it to long-on
angled full and outside off from round the stumps, slower ball stops on the batsman. He cracks it away between mid-off and the covers
Junaid goes wide of the crease and delivers a near yorker, swerves in a bit, bunted down to long-on
Tamim steps away outside leg, the bowler follows him with a yorker, which is squeezed away to the off side
yorker at the base of off, Junaid ventured wide of the crease there. Mushfiq can only squirt it back to the bowler
yorker outside leg as Tamim makes room, I guess he managed an inside edge onto the pad
very full on middle and leg, he backs away and squeezes it towards mid-on. The man at midwicket moves to his right and stops the ball
length ball outside off, Mushfiq backs away and launches it over the covers. He simply nailed that one
back of a length and jags in on the leg stump as Mushfiq was looking for make room. Off the pad and it runs away to the off side
too full and on middle and off, not quite a yorker, drilled down to long-off
back of a length and on the hips from round the wicket, he manages an inside-edge that trickles in front of square on the leg side
back of a length and on middle, slapped in front of square on the off side for one
tossed up, he uses his feet and slices it over extra cover. The man from sweeper runs to his left and cuts it off
darted fuller, he backs away and squeezes it to the covers
darted short on middle, Tamim ventures deep in the crease and pulls it down to long-on
low full toss on the leg stump, clipped to deep midwicket
dragged shortish and on the leg stump, Tamim can't help it away. Off the pad and trickles to the leg side
back of a length and down leg, Mushfiq shuffles miles across off and aims to lap-scoop it over the keeper, AB-style, but misses. Wide called
77mph slower bouncer, climbs over to the keeper as Mushfiq can't slice it away. Beaten by the change of pace. One bouncer for the over
slower back of a length ball on off, pushed to extra-cover
low full toss outside leg following Tamim, who was making room. Off the back pad and rolls to the off side and they cross over for an overthrow

And the stand has finally ended! This was dug in short, off-speed ball outside off as Tamim backs away. He initially looked to pull it away, then skews it high into the air. The man from covers (Azhar Ali I guess) and mid-off (Saad Nasim) converge, collide, but Saad Nasim just about hangs onto the catch. Tamim elicits a standing ovation
dug in on a back of a length and outside off, pulled away towards deep midwicket
back of a length and outside off, flashed to Fawad at backward point, diving save
low full toss, Mushfiq takes toll of it as he slog-swipes it in front of square on the leg side
fuller on middle and leg, turned behind square leg for one
shortish and outside off, punched down to long-on
fuller and on middle and off, Mushfiq unleashes another slog-sweep and sends it over deep midwicket
round-armed flat and quick, worked behind square on the leg side
flatter and on middle and leg, bunted down to long-on
back of a length, Shakib stays back and dabs it behind point
drifting down leg, Shakib helps it fine to the right of the diving keeper. Minimal effort required to put those away
back of a length and outside off, chopped down to deep third man
slippery short balll bounces over the stumps as Shakib pulls and misses. Might have been the change of pace there
back of a length and outside off, Shakib latches onto it, lashing a cut behind point, to the right of the fielder there
slower bouncer outside off, foils Shakib's attempted pull. He can only drag it away to long-on
darted short and wide outside off, cut to point
Shakib nips down the track and chips it over the bowler's head
darted flat and quick outside off, he waits on it and late cuts it to the left of a diving short third man. Shakib and Mushfiq punch gloves

beats short third to his right now. Slid through outside off, glided away to the boundary. This is the first time that two Bangladesh batsmen have struck centuries in an ODI. Mushfiq roars in celebration
leg-stumpish and nudged away to short fine for one
length ball on off, Shakib bends down, does not connect with the slog-sweep properly, finds backward point
shortish and outside off, Mushfiq waits on it and steers it away to deep third man
Rahat tests Shakib with a bumpy short ball, Shakib is beaten on the pull
on a length and outside off, Shakib slogs and drags it to midwicket off the inner part of the bat
short and outside off as Mushfiq shuffles across off, looks to ramp it away and misses. Fine leg was inside the ring and Mushfiq was aiming to exploit that
back of a length and outside off, mishit cut to sweeper cover
fuller and on middle and leg, Shakib moves around in the crease and whips it in the air over midwicket
fuller and outside leg as Shakib backs away, he adjusts and pushes it down to long-on
Junaid goes wide of the crease and fires it on off, Mushfiq goes for a big slog sweep and manages an inside edge that sneaks away to the leg side
Junaid does not get hold of the yorker, delivers a full toss, which is lapped over short fine with a healthy helping of cheek
mighty full, not yorker length, drilled down to long-on
Junaid hits the blockhole outside off, Mushfiq can't get bat onto it and slice it away
83.1mph outside off, Mushfiq shuffles across, misses the attempted lap-shot again
Shakib comes down the track, Wahab pulls his length back outside off. Lofted over the covers, not middled, though

End of a rapid knock from Mushfiq. Dug in on a back of a length and outside off, Mushfiq has a big swing at that, does not get hold of it. Nicks it to the keeper off a thick outside edge. He raises his bat and acknowledges the raucous cheers as he walks back to the hut. The umpires check for a possible no-ball, Wahab exults, that's a legal ball
back of a length and on middle and leg, turned through midwicket
length ball on off, slogged away to the leg side
length delivery outside off, Sabbir looks to hoist it over long-on. He does not get hold of it, yet the ball goes over long-on
shortish and on the leg stump, he swivels on the back foot as he half pulls and half paddles it backward of square leg
Shakib backs away, Junaid follows him with a full ball, which is drilled to the right of mid-off
mighty full and hurled wide outside off, Sabbir wants to thrash his through the covers. He checks his shot belatedly, aims to dab it to third man, misses again. Wide called
full toss outside off as Junaid does not meet with the yorker, mishit loft in front of long-off
shortish and outside off, steered away to deep third man
yorker outside leg, following Shakib, who was backing away. Dug out in front of the bowler
lowish full toss down leg, Shakib eases it through vacant short fine leg, beats the man in the deep as well. This was a bad ball though, asking for trouble
Junaid hunts for a yorker again, ends up delivering a low full toss, which is pushed to mid-off
yorker fired outside leg as Shakib backs away and misses, the keeper is beaten to his right as well, these as bonus runs
length ball, Shakib goes for a slog and drags it to the leg side off the inner part of the bat
banged in short and moves in from outside off, he slogs and gets an inside edge to short fine
slid down leg, Shakib misses the glance, the keeper flings to his right and stops the ball. But they cross over and steal another run

Wahab has shattered the stumps. Why was he appealing? The leg stump is knocked out, that's your wicket Riaz. This was a near yorker hurled in from wide of the crease, Sabbir attempts a dinky little reverse-sweep and misses, the leg stump is rattled
length ball on middle, he backs away and carves it to the right of short third, Junaid mis-fields
116.9 short slower ball outside off, Shakib can't carve it away. Beaten by the change of pace, but is past the tram-line

Shakib given out lbw off the last ball. He wants to review, but this was crashing into the base of middle. Low full toss, Shakib shuffles across and misses the attempted sweep and rapped in front middle. The on-field umpire's decision prevails. But Bangladesh have put up a record-breaking total - their highest in ODIs

inn2.comm: pitched up and outside off, Azhar reaches out and drives it to point
full and wide outside off at 138.2kph, he reaches out and square-drives to point
back of a length and slanted across off, left alone
dug in on a back of a length and outside off, punched into the covers
mighty full and outside off again, he drives, hits it straight to cover. He can't thread the gap
shortish and hurries on outside off, mistimed pull to mid-on
back of a length and on off, Sarfraz shimmies across off and tucks it behind square on the leg side and gets off the mark
on a good length and moving away just outside off at 141.3ks , poked to third man off a thick outside edge
on a length and outside off, a nervy-looking Azahar shuffles across off and does not meet with the flick. Off the pad and rolls to the off side
back of a length and down leg as Taskin's radar goes haywire. The keeper dives to his left and is beaten
back of a length and cuts back in from outside off, Azahar wants to go over the leg side, gets an inside edge, misses the off stump and dies in front of the keeper
132.9ks, banged in short and rises outside off, he yanks his bottom hand off the bat and gloves it behind point
back of a length and just outside off, punched back at the bowler
back of a length and rushes on off, Sarfraz shuffles across and works it in front of square on the leg side for one
smokin'. Back of a length and outside off, he punches it past point, sends it whistling away to the boundary
very full and wide outside off, he reaches out and slices it over backward point. Third man cuts it off
back of a length, skiddy on off, clipped to the right of short midwicket
86.6mph bouncer outside off, Sarfraz keeps it eyes on it before ducking under that
shortish and hurries on off to make a mess of Sarfraz's attempted pull. Mishit to the right of midwicket
dug in short and wide outside off, he gets on top of the bounce and carves it up and over backward point, to deep third man
back of a length and swerves in from outside off, Sarfraz checks his shot and punches it in front of point
very full and outside off, Sarfraz shuffles across and does not connect with the airy flick, wears it on the pad. Well Outside the line of off
85.4mph lifter outside off, Sarfraz hops up, aims to carve it away and misses, the steepling bounce foiled his attempted upper cut
on a length and on off, Sarfraz walks down the track and chips it in front of mid-on
on a length and outside off, Sarfraz lays into a punchy drive, Nasir moves to his left from the covers and stops the ball
Sarfraz walks forward, takes this length delivery from outside off and slog-sweeps it behind square on the leg side. Good connection
back of a length and on off, nudged in front of mid-on for a speedy single. His partner reciprocated as well
shortish and on off, Sarfraz twirls his wrists and works it to the right of midwicket for one
fuller and outside off, he plays an away-from-the-body push and squirt-edges it down to deep third man. He was also glued to the crease there
banged in short and outside off, does not rise much. He rolls his wrists on the pull and pulls it behind square leg
beautiful shot. Back of a length and outside off, he stands up tall and balanced as he punches it between the covers and point, the ball skips away to the cover-point boundary
Azahar Ali fetches this short ball outside off and pulls it to the right of midwicket for successive fours
hurled in full at the base of off at 88.4mph, swerves in late, jabbed back at the bowler
on a fullish length and on off, he comes forward and pushes it back to the bowler
beaten soundly is Sarfraz. Back of a length and outside off, he is crease-bound as the ball passes the defensively- thrust bat, beaten on the outside edge
dug i n on a back of a length and outside off, punched straight to Mahmudullah at short point
pitched up and moves in on off, pushed back to the bowler, who makes a half-stop after stretching his right hand
Sarfraz gets on top of the bounce and hits the gap, again. This was shortish and outside off, he invests in another punchy drive, bisects point and the covers
looped up on off, Azhar uses his feet and drives it past the tumbling bowler to mid-off
pushed through on off, Sarfraz goes down on one knee and sweeps it towards long leg
quicker on off, blocked back to the bowler
swept away to short fine
arm-ball from Sunny, comes in with the angle and strikes him on the pad in front of the leg stump as he misses the flick. This was sliding down, though
Sarfraz nips down the track and drills it down the ground to the long-on boundary
slides on with the arm on middle and leg, poked in front of square on the leg side
looped up on and spins away late to catch Sarfraz on the back thigh, the lbw appeal is turned down
Sarfraz uses his feet and forces it to midwicket
pushed through on middle and leg, he manages an inside edge on the tickle to short fine
fuller and outside off, he shovel-drives it down to long-off
skids off the deck on off, he hangs back and punches it to the left of the covers
straighter in line, he uses his feet and clips it to the right of mid-on
Sarfraz comes down the track, Sunny fires it on middle, squirted to short fine
fuller and on middle and leg, Sarfraz goes down on one knee and sweeps it backward of square leg for one
darted flat and quick, skids through on off, Azar cuts and finds point
on a length and outside off, pushed to the man at extra-cover
tossed up on off, he uses his feet and drives it down to long-off for a comfortable single
flat and hurled outside off, he throws his bat at a drive and mistimes it to cover
poked out towards point as this was full and nicely flighted outside off
straighter on middle, he lifts it inside-out over mid-off
lowish full toss, swept away past short fine, but the man from backward square runs across and keeps it to a single
tossed up and fuller from Shakib, down the track and driven down to long-off
flighted on off, Azhar uses his feet again, meets the pitch of the ball and laces one to long-off

Sarfraz goes for a  slog-sweep and holes out. This was flat on off, he does not middle the sweep, Nasir Hossain runs to his left from deep backward square leg and snaps up a sharp tumbling catch. Shakib is pumped. Sarfraz slams his bat onto the turf as he trudges back.
straight roller on middle, blocked back to the bowler
fuller and outside off, Azhar uses his feet and drives it to long-off
flat and hurries on the leg stump, beats Hafeez's defensive push but this was sliding down leg and the lbw appeal is shot down
Sunny pushes this through at 89.2kph, Hafeez advances and defends
tossed up, he uses his feet and drives it to the left of the bowler, beats the dive and gets a single
fuller and outside off, he invests in a wristy drive after sinking to one knee, finds extra-cover
slower through the air and spins around off, dabbed to the off side
skids off the deck on middle and leg, punched off the back foot to midwicket
Hafeez comes down the track and taps this flighted ball to the covers
pitched up and outside off at 83.8kph, Hafeez finds the gap and covers with a creamy drive

Fine throw from Sarkar, Hafeez has been run out. Azhar uses his feet and drives it in front of mid-on off an inside edge. The pair look for a scampered single, Hafeez is late to take off. Sarkar swoops down on the ball and lasers an accurate, flat throw to the keeper, who whips the bails off to catch Hafeez short. He was guilty of ball watching and pays the penalty
worked away to the leg side
flighted on off, pushed defensively to mid-off
fuller and on middle and leg, turned in front of square on the leg side
flighted ball around off, pushed towards mid-off
dropped shortish and outside off, chopped behind point, beats the fielder and gets a four
an appeal for lbw, did Haris manage an inside edge there. Pushed through and spins in, Haris gets an inner snick to foil the lbw appeal
blocked to the off side
quicker and slides on outside off, he pushes at it and gets beaten
clipped off the pads to the left of midwicket
fuller and on middle and leg, he runs down the track and drags it over mid-on off the inside section of the bat. Not middled, but collects a four
slid through on the pads, tucked to the left of midwicket for one
flat and quick on off, blocked in front of square on the leg side
fullish and on middle and leg, worked straight to short midwicket
flicked off the pads to the leg side, he can't find the gap, though
shortish and hurries on off, fraught with danger. Yet he aims for a cut and chops it in front of short third
pushed on the pads, nudged to the leg side
slid through quicker and shorter as Sunny sees Haris step out, pushed to the left of the bowler
quicker and outside off, poked in front of square on the off side
fuller and on middle and leg, he eases a drive down to long-on for a single
Azar is down the track, gets close to the pitch of the ball and punches it down to long-off
looped up outside off, Haris uses his feet and drives it back at the bowler
pushed through on off, Haris executes a whippy drive to long-on
dug in shortish and outside off, punched away to the left of the covers. The fielder game chases the ball and hauls it in with a slide, limiting it to three
flatter and on middle and leg, busy footwork from Azhar as he chips down the track and flicks it to long-on
fullish and on off, he flips his wrists and drives a single to long-on
he fetches this from outside off, bends down and sweeps it away to deep backward square
turned off the pads through midwicket
shortish and outside off, Azhar switches his balance onto the back foot and cuts it firmly to sweeper cover
long-hop on the leg stump and duly dispatched. Haris' eyes lit up as he rocked back and smashed a pull, sending it over the deep midwicket boundary. The fielder can only watch it soar over him
back of a length and outside off, chopped to the covers as he does not get hold of the cut
fuller and on middle and leg, flicked neatly to cow corner
pushed through, milked down to long-on
slid through on off, Haris steps out and blocks it back to the bowler
Haris uses his feet again and eases a single down to long-on
parcelled up and dispatched. Shortish and outside off, he rocks on the back foot and slaps it away after picking the gap in the covers
shortish and rises outside off, he hops up and fends it towards third man. He was caught in a tangle, but did well to fend it away
back of a length and on off, he hangs back and turns it to midwicket
banged in shortish and outside off as advances down the track and forces it to deep cover
banged in short and rises on middle, Haris rises on middle and blocks it to the off side
Haris opens the face of his bat on impact with this short ball outside off and glides it to deep point
good length ball outside off, guided past backward point to deep third man
very full and on off, Azar is nice and balanced as he drives it to the right of mid-on
Rubel grunts as he delivers this shortish ball outside off, chopped down to deep third man
pitched up and outside off, driven to point
shortish and hurries on off, tucks the batsman up for room. Chipped to the leg side

on a length and outside off, he shuffles across and works it adroitly to mid-on for his fifty on captaincy debut. He said he was ready for the challenge. Can he guide his team home in the face of a steep target of 330
veering onto the pads, tucked away to long leg
shortish and outside off, he rides the bounce and steers it to deep third man
back of a length and sliding across the left-hander, dinked down to third man
Azhar gives the charge, the bowler drags his length back, might have been slower in pace as well. Azhar adjusts and punches it to the off-side sweeper
shortish and outside off with some extra lift, chopped in front of point
back of a length and on the hips, nudged to the right of short fine for one
Azhar shuffles across and glides this short ball outside off to deep third man. The fielder does not collect the ball properly, fumbles
back of a length and outside off, Azhar throws his bat at it and carves it past backward point. One hand came off the bat-handle, but the ball ran away to the boundary
back of a length and outside off again, punched out to sweeper cover
he bangs a bouncer, Haris sinks under it and lets it sail through to the keeper
another bouncer on the leg stump, he sinks under it
shortish and outside off, skids through with some extra lift. He had to fetch the pull from there, miscues it in front of mid-on. Almost carried to the fielder
back of a length and on off, Haris manipulates it straight to short midwicket
very, very wristy! Azhar jumps across off, takes this length ball from off and turns it through midwicket
short and rises outside off, Haris gets on top of the bounce and forces it to the off-side sweeper
very full and outside off, Azhar Ali uses his feet, reaches out, swings and slices it over backward point. This was the off-speed ball at 110.4 kph
Azhar rides the bounce of this short ball outside off and deftly glides it to deep third man
back of a length and on the stumps, he hangs back and pushes it back to the bowler

yorker outside off at 84.9mph, Haris can't squeeze it out. There was a sound there and Shakib wants that to be reviewed. It's a legal ball. Was there a deflection there? Did he nick it off? The noise may have come from the bat hitting the ground. The TV umpire examines it from various angles, takes his own sweet time and gives it NOT OUT. Rahim went up for an appeal straightaway. The review ends in vain, Shakib is on his knees and shakes his head
mighty full on middle and leg, dug out to the leg side
back of a length and on off, tucked to the right of midwicket, who dives and makes a half-save
back of a length and outside off, he deflects it to the left of the keeper off the face of the bat. Delicately done
Rubel grunts as he delivers a 140.0ks bumper, Haris is happy to duck under it
136kph bouncer angling across, Haris seeks to pull and only meets with thin air
very full on middle and leg, drilled down the track, past the bowler, but not well-timed
length ball on middle, pushed down the track, the bowler moves to his right and half-stops the ball, forcing Haris to retreat
back of a length and outside off, punched with an open face to the right of backward point, deep third man (Mahmudullah) runs to his left and cuts it off
back of a length and on off, Haris camps on the back foot and tucks it to midwicket, finds the fielder
back of a length and on middle and leg, clipped through backward square leg
full toss outside off and Haris takes toll of it as he flays it away to the left of backward point, sends it screaming away to the boundary
picked away off the hips to the leg side. Taskin is quick onto the ball and keeps it to only a single
slid through on middle and off, pushed to short cover
veering onto the pads, whipped through midwicket
round-armish short ball outside off, slapped to the right of backward point
tossed up, pitched on off and spins across, dabbed in front of point
drifting down leg, wide called
flat and on off, tucked around the corner on the leg side
lobbed up outside off, Azhar comes down the track and drives it down to long-off
tossed up on middle and leg, driven down to long-on
fuller and on middle and leg, worked behind square leg
straight roller on middle, drilled down to long-on
darted short and on off, punched off the back foot to the covers
slid through and he gets some quick spin, nudged to the leg side
flatter and quicker on middle and leg, swept away behind square leg, there is protection in the deep
back of a length and outside off, he steps out and flat-bats it to the covers
back of a length and on middle, he backs away, flashes and gets a thick outside edge through the vacant slip cordon

Taskin sets off on a aeroplane celebration, a la Shoaib Akhtar, he is charged up. Azhar Ali perishes for 72. This was on a back of a length and outside off, Azar seeks to run it away through slip, instead edges it to the keeper, who moves to his right and snaffles it
back of a length and hurries on outside off, chopped to point
pitched further up and on off, driven back at the bowler
back of a length and jags back in outside off, he reads it well and ignores it
pitched up and curves away outside off, Haris is crease-bound as he pushes at it and edges it to the right of the diving keeper
back of a length and on middle and leg, patted to the left of mid-on
back of a length and outside off, punched to the left of mid-off, defeats the fielder. Rizwan's balance left nothing to be wanted, nice way to open his account
short and wide outside off and deposited to the backward point boundary with a strong cut. Third man is beaten as well
back of a length and on middle and leg, Rizwan twirls his wrists and flicks it away to the cow corner boundary. Deep midwicket runs across to his left but can't prevent a hattrick of fours
Abul errs full and straight again, tucked to the left of deep midwicket again, he collects a couple
Haris angles his bat while meeting this length ball slanted across off, dabs it to deep third man
shortish and outside off, slashed away to sweeper cover
138ks, bouncer, Haris takes shelter by ducking under that
back of a length and outside off, dinked to deep third man and Haris gets to a fifty. He still has plenty of work to do
near yorker at the base of middle and leg, jabbed down to long-on

Taskin bangs this one short and outside off, Rizwan wants to pull it away. He shoots it up in the air off a top-edge. Taskin runs forward, then runs across to his right, but the ball spirals away from him and lands in no-man's land in between square leg and short midwicket region.The bowler tumbles in vain
shorter in length, punched to sweeper
arm-ball outside off, he misses the cut and falls over
fuller and straighter, driven to long-on
round-armish and flighted on middle, he manages an inside edge that dribbles to the leg side
pushed through on middle and leg, nudged towards mid-on
flatter and outside leg, he backs away and squirts it to short fine
very full and outside off, he presses forward and drives it to the covers
back of a length and outside off, does not rise much. Rizwan pulls and does not connect
back of a length and outside off, punched out to Nasir at covers
dug in shortish and outside off, steered to deep third man

Crucial strike, Harris has to depart, Taskin has his second. This was dug in short and rushes onto Haris, who miscues the pull in the air. Mahmudullah runs in from mid-on and pouches it, tumbling to the ground. Haris threw his head back as soon as he met the ball. He knew that he had made a hash of the pull
back of a length and outside off, Fawad with that crab-like stance jerks it to the off side
this one grips in the pitch and turns away sharply, he pokes at it before dragging his bat inside the line
flatter on off, defensively pushed to the covers
round-armish and outside off, patted into the covers. They aim for a risky single, but decide against it
shortish and on off, turned to the right of the bowler with some elaborate wristwork
flatter and quicker outside off, Fawad misses the flick. Outside the line of off, not out
fuller and around off, nudged into the covers
shortish and widish outside off, slapped away to the left of backward point. Third man mops it up
fuller and fired on off, drilled back at the bowler
pitched up and outside off, lashed to the left of short cover. Good stop from Nasir ( I guess)
short and wide, he flashes a cut to sweeper cover
back of a length and outside off, Fawad, who had initially shuffled across leg, punchily blocks it to the covers
darted full and on the pads, he misses the glance and they cross over for a leg bye
angled on middle, defended to leg
flatter on middle and leg, blocked in front of short midwicket
darted short and outside off, he ventures deep in the crease and pulls it to long-on. Abul attacks the ball at long-on and keeps it to one
quicker and fired on middle and leg, defended to the right of the bowler
quick fizzer on middle at 92ks, jabbed back to the right of the bowler
Rizwan uses his feet, Mahmudullah drags his length back a bit, skews off a leading edge to the left of the bowler, towards mid-off
tossed up on middle, pushed past the bowler to mid-on
flighted on middle, tapped in front of point. Rubel rushes in but does not gather the ball
fuller on the stumps, drilled back at the bowler. This time, Arfat does not make a clean stop
sliding across off, Fawad cuts off the back foot and finds point
drifting onto the leg stump, knocked wide of midwicket
he uses his feet, nearly yorks himself, helped down to long-on
veering down leg, helped to short fine with a paddle, off the inside edge
similar ball and he cashes in his cheque. Leg-stumpish, he bends down and beats short fine to his left now
darted short and wide outside off, he cuts it behind point, where Taskin misjudges it, overruns the ball, slips and lets it through to third man
looped up on middle, dead-batted
drifting down leg, worked to the left of short fine for one
flat and on middle and leg, wristed through midwicket
pushed through, Fawad charges down the track and lifts it over mid-on
darted full on middle, jammed out to extra-cover. The fielder has a shy at non-strikers' and misses
quicker and on off, he drills a drive to wide long-off. They hustle across for two and collect it
near yorker on the leg stump, jabbed down to long-on
full toss on the leg stump, pushed to mid-off for another of those scampered singles
full and on middle, driven well. The man at covers moves to his right and collects the ball
flat and full on middle, he sinks to one knee, pasting a slog-sweep over midwicket
slid through outside off, pushed to the covers
low full toss on middle and leg, Shakib escapes punishment as Fawad tucks it straight to midwicket
quicker on the legs, whipped to long-on
Fawad steps out and yorks himself, dug out to right of the bowler
flat and on the leg stump, heaved over to cow corner. The man at long-on dives to his left and then relays the ball to the one coming across from deep midwicket
fuller and on middle and leg, whipped to long-on

Fawad Alam steps away outside leg, Sunny follows him with a full toss, which is softly chipped to Sarkar, who reverse-cups his hands around it at mid-off. The bowler breaks into a little jig. The asking rate reads 10.59
round-armed and spins in on middle, the ball rolls to the leg side off an inside snick
Nasim shuffles across, adjusts and pushes this one back to the bowler
slid through on off, arm-ball, drifts in. He wants to lash a drive through the covers, gets an inside edge to leg
Sunny knocks Nasim for a duck on debut. Nasim makes room, this was the arm-ball on off. Too close to cut, Nasim does not meet with the stroke. Cannons onto off
tossed up and spins across, sliced in front of point
this one slides in with the angle on off, tapped to the off side for a quick single
flighted delivery on middle, Wahab stays back and rolls it to leg an inside-edge
on the pads now, he does not connect with the glance. They cross over a leg bye
flatter on middle and leg, whipped through midwicket
floated up and on off, knocked in front of point
low full toss, flicked away to cow corner, Nasim duck on debut, Rizwan fifty on debut
he goes low for a paddle, plays it to short fine
flatter and quicker outside off, he takes it on the pad
drifting down leg, off the pad to the right of short fine
Rizwan steps away, the bowler follows him with a flat ball outside leg. Misses the slog-sweep
flatter and darted on off, whipped with the wrists to long-on
low full toss outside off, he goes low and paddle-sweeps it behind square on the leg side
he chips down the track, Rubel is wary of it as he drags it short and outside off. Top-edges the pull, the man from midwicket runs back, but the ball evades him, Sunny the fielder
shortish and hurries on middle, he backs away and punches it to third man, Rizwan wanted a second, was halfway down the track and is sent back by Wahab
flash and miss to a length ball outside off

yorker from Rubel, tails back in middle and strikes Wahab flush on the front boot as he was beaten for pace and was late to bring his bat down. The forefinger goes up, Wahab reviews, almost instantly. Might have been drifting down leg. Rubel fires a few verbal volleys at Wahab, who returns the favour. The umpire intervenes to hose down the verbal skirmishes. The Bangladesh players are confident.  Hawk-Eye shows that it was going down. The decision has been reversed.
low full toss outside off, squeezed to the right of the covers. The fielder does not collect the ball cleanly, only a single, though
low full toss on middle and off, slapped to mid-off
slippery bouncer from Taskin, gets big on Wahab, who is beaten on the pull
low full toss on middle, he flexes his muscles and powers it to the deep midwicket boundary
takes it from outside off, sinks to one knee and laps it to short fine
fired full and outside off, he loads up for a  slog-swipe. Gets an inside edge that runs away fine on the leg side
slower ball from Taskin, Wahab waits on it, picks it up and lofts it in the air over midwicket

Taskin hoodwinks Wahab with a well-disguised slower one from the back of the hand. Wahab steps away and aims to slog it away over the leg side, but does not connect. He was way too early into it and Taskin hits the top of middle and leg
full toss outside off, that's a tripe ball. Rizwan backs away and pummels it between mid-off and the covers
high full toss, over the waistline, that's a no-ball. The batsman looked to go over the leg side but ducks under it. Rubel put his hand up in apology straightaway
he shuffles across but does not connect with the lap-scoop
Another one bites the dust, Rizwan gone for 67 off 58. He fetches the slog sweep from outside off but top-edges it in the air. Nasir runs across to his right from deep square leg and swallows it
142.7kph yorker, right in the blockhole on off, dug out to the covers

another yorker, which is dug out to point. The fielder nails a direct hit at the non-strikers' as there is a communication breakdown, but Junaid is in. Oh no, the bat is in the air. Nice, flat throw, hits the bullseye. The bat was in the air and Junaid has to depart for a duck. Poor mix-up..
pushed through on off, he manages an inside edge to the leg side

Bangladesh break 16-year hoodoo with a 79-run win. Ajmal has been given out lbw, Shakib shakes hands with the umpire. Ajmal reviews. This was pushed through flat and quick from round the stumps, catches Ajmal on the front pad on the knee roll, looks like this was sliding down. Or was it clipping leg? No inner edge. Hawk-Eye shows that it would clip the top of leg. Bangladesh break the 16-year drought and record their second ODI win over Pakistan
